meanings.definition: The period during which adolescents reach sexual maturity and become capable of reproduction.
meanings.sent1: During puberty, teenagers experience many physical changes.
meanings.sent2: My sister will reach puberty in a few years.
meanings.sent3: Puberty can sometimes make teenagers feel awkward.
meanings.sent4: The journey through puberty is like a caterpillar transforming into a butterfly.
meanings.sent5: The onset of puberty marks the beginning of adulthood for many.

meanings.definition: The age at which a person becomes capable of sexual reproduction.
meanings.sent1: At puberty, individuals become able to have children.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that she was at the age of puberty.
meanings.sent3: It's fascinating how puberty signals the start of a new chapter in life.
meanings.sent4: Reaching puberty is like unlocking a new level in the game of life.
meanings.sent5: The concept of puberty is a natural part of human development.
